Plot: After Cheryl Frasier and Stan Fields are kidnapped, Gracie goes undercover in Las Vegas to find them.
Title: Miss Congeniality 2: Armed and Fabulous
Writer: Marc Lawrence (characters), Katie Ford (characters), Caryn Lucas (characters), Marc Lawrence
Actors: Sandra Bullock, Regina King, Enrique Murciano, William Shatner
tomatoConsensus: Sandra Bullock is still as appealing as ever; too bad the movie is not pageant material.
